entities.name: voldemort's lamp
entities.description: Voldemort's lamp is mentioned as one of the objects that was extinguished.

entities.description: Morf in's candle is mentioned as one of the objects that was extinguished.

entities.name: dumbledore's fingers
entities.description: Dumbledore's fingers are described as closing tightly around Harry's arm.

entities.name: harry's arm
entities.description: Harry's arm is mentioned as being held by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore's office
entities.description: Dumbledore's office is described as having a soft golden light.

entities.name: marvolo's ring
entities.description: Marvolo's ring is mentioned as being gone when Morfin awoke next morning.

entities.name: little hangleton
entities.description: The village of Little Hangleton is mentioned as the location where three bodies were found.

entities.name: tom riddle senior
entities.description: Tom Riddle Senior is mentioned as one of the people who died.

entities.name: his mother
entities.description: His mother is mentioned as one of the people who died.

entities.name: his father
entities.description: His father is mentioned as one of the people who died.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is mentioned as being unable to remember anything from a certain point onwards.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as being in Dumbledore's office.

relationships.description: Tom Riddle Senior died with his mother.
Tom Riddle Senior died with his father.
